text: Ezɨ dughiar mam Jonɨn suren gumaziba koma Farisin suren gumaziba me God ko mɨkɨmasa dagheba ataghrasi. Ezɨ Iesusɨn suren gumaziba dughiar kamɨn apima gumazir maba Iesus bagha izava kamaghɨn an azangsɨsi, “Kar manmaghɨn amizir arazim? Jonɨn suren gumaziba koma Farisin suren gumaziba me datɨrɨghɨn God ko mɨkɨmasa dagheba ataghrazima, nɨn suren gumaziba God ko mɨkɨmasa dagheba ataghrazir puvatɨ.”
